title: Officials Estimate Nearly Half A Million Migrants Await The Journey To Europe
teaser: Nearly 6,000 migrants were rescued after attempting to make it to Europe from North Africa. A British naval officer says there are indications that as many as 500,000 migrants could be waiting in Libya for the means to make the crossing.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
